bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Application of Surge-Protective Components in Surge Protective Devices and Equipment Ports
Part 1 Gas Discharge Tubes (GDTs)
IEEE Draft Guide for the Application of Surge-Protective Components in Surge Protective Devices and Equipment Ports - Part 1 Gas Discharge Tubes (GDTs)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The C62.42 guide series covers surge protective components (SPCs) used in power and telecom surge protective devices (SPDs) and equipment ports. This part on Gas Discharge Tube (GDT) technology SPCs covers: Component construction Characteristics Ratings Application examples The application examples are given in two informative Annexes covering: basic circuits and protection circuits specific to communications, local area networks, high frequency feeds and industrial services.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
